price: Ẹ kíyè sí i! Dájúdájú àwọn gan-an ni òbìlẹ̀jẹ́, ṣùgbọ́n wọn kò fura.
arabic: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡمُفۡسِدُونَ وَلَٰكِن لَّا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: alā innahum humu al-muf'sidūna walākin lā yashʿurūna
